statements: SELECT * FROM collaborative_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM collaborative_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM collaborative_projects WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT project_id, total_contributions FROM collaborative_projects WHERE total_contributions > 100;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM collaborative_projects WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM collaborative_projects WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM collaborative_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM collaborative_projects WHERE total_contributions > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, total_contributions FROM collaborative_projects WHERE status = 'Active' AND total_contributions < 50;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM collaborative_projects WHERE status = 'Active' AND total_contributions BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY total_contributions DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, contribution_amount FROM contributors;
SELECT email FROM contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE id = 10;
SELECT project_id, date_completed FROM project_progress WHERE points_earned < 50;
SELECT name, email FROM contributors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE points_earned > 50 ORDER BY date_completed DESC;
SELECT id, name, contribution_amount FROM contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM project_progress GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT id, name, email, contribution_amount FROM contributors WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects;
SELECT member_name, email, role FROM members;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, role, email FROM members ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, email FROM members WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT project_name, end_date, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, member_name, hours_spent FROM projects p JOIN contributions c ON p.project_id = c.project_id JOIN members m ON c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE hours_spent > 10;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_points = 10;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT team_name, players.player_name FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_leader = players.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score > 50 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_score > 0 AND player_score <= 50;
SELECT t.team_name, p.player_name FROM teams t INNER JOIN players p ON t.team_leader = p.player_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_points FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'To Do';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM members WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_contributions FROM projects JOIN project_contributions ON projects.project_id = project_contributions.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT member_id, progress_status, progress_date FROM project_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_value > 100 ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
